pages.text: Break the bonds of magic. The Ritual of Unmaking extracts enchantments from items and places them onto books, allowing you to repurpose or duplicate enchantments.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 3000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 0 LP (one-time use)$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 20 ticks$(br2)$(bold)Effect Range:$() 5x5x5 blocks around ritual$(br2)$(bold)Usage:$() Throw books and enchanted items near the ritual. It will automatically deactivate after extracting enchantments.

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: $(bold)Regular Enchanted Items:$()$(br)Extracts all enchantments to separate enchanted books. The item is left unenchanted.$(br2)$(bold)Enchanted Books:$()$(br)Splits multi-enchant books and creates $(bold)two copies$() of each enchantment at reduced level (level; 1, minimum 1).$(br2)$(italic)Unmake and remake at will.$()
